mapper.insert: INSERT INTO menProd(prodType, prodCat, prodName, prodListP, prodPrice, prodDeli, prodCode, prodOrigin, prodThumb, prodThumbOriName, prodThumbUrl, prodCont, prodContOriName, prodContUrl) VALUES (#{prodType}, #{prodCat}, #{prodName}, #{prodListP}, #{prodPrice}, #{prodDeli}, #{prodCode}, #{prodOrigin}, #{prodThumb}, #{prodThumbOriName}, #{prodThumbUrl}, #{prodCont}, #{prodContOriName}, #{prodContUrl})
